Title: Teacher Earl
Plot:
Earl decides to teach English as a Second language to cross "Made fun of people with accents" off his karma list. While Ralph an old friend is released from prison, Earl tries to convince him in the ways of karma however Ralph ends up kidnapping Randy trying to get his hands on Earl?s lotto winnings.


Recap:

Earl loved to make fun of people with funny accents and because of Karma, he wants to pay back all the people he made fun of. Scandinavian, Hispanic or Asian, he laughed at them all. What
GuestStars: David Aranovich,  Sunkrish Bala,  Giovanni Ribisi,  Pramod  Kumar,  Phoenix  Smith,  Wahn  Lee,  Abdoulaye N'Gom,  Patty Maloney,  Tanner Maguire
